valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 20 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low just west of Rockall 995 expected Hebrides 999 by 1800 Friday. New low expected Rockall 1008 by same time. Low Viking 996 losing its identity by that time
